name: Scallop Blade
description: If【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Spd+5 during combat. Effect:【Dagger ５】  【Penalty】 All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).  【Dagger ５】 After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-５ on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.
